compatibility.notes: The BSD-3-Clause-No-Nuclear-Warranty license is permissive and allows for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice and license in all redistributions.
Provide a disclaimer of warranty and liability.
Acknowledge that the software is not intended for nuclear facility use.
license.name: BSD-3-Clause-No-Nuclear-Warranty
obligations: Retain copyright notice in source code redistributions.
Include copyright notice and license in binary redistributions.
Obtain written permission for using the name of Sun Microsystems, Inc. or contributors for endorsement.
